response_parsed.title: Deploying Serverless Handlers using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to deploy serverless functions using FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.
key_points: Understanding the basics of FastAPI and its benefits for building serverless APIs
Setting up a development environment with Python 3.12+
Deploying the FastAPI application as a serverless function on a cloud provider (e.g., AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions)
Handling API requests and responses in the serverless environment
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this tutorial.
FastAPI version 0.70.0 or later is recommended.
caveats: Some cloud providers may require additional configuration or dependencies for deploying FastAPI applications as serverless functions.
Ensure you have the necessary permissions and resources in your cloud provider account to create and run serverless functions.
